messages.title: Dear Resident
messages.content: For those of you who I am yet to meet, I want to introduce myself. I'm David Johnston, and I am standing to be your MP on 12th December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investments to make junctions safer, improvements to the A4130 and the A34, and bringing the Science Bridge into the Milton Park area.
Discussing local policing with Deputy Police and Crime Commissioner, ensures streets are safe, reduce crime and anti-social behaviour, and an additional 183 officers from the Prime Minister's plan.
David's passion to bring his expertise to the constituency, work with employers to provide opportunities and work experience to unlock the potential of local young people.
Conscious of environmental needs. Protection and preservation of green spaces, reduction of greenhouse gas emissions, UK's green commitments, and commitment to a zero carbon Britain by 2050.

issues.environment: Conscious of environmental needs. Protection and preservation of green spaces, reduction of greenhouse gas emissions, UK's green commitments, and commitment to a zero carbon Britain by 2050.

leaflet.personalStatement: I was the first person in my family to go to university, have spent the last 16 years running and working for innovative education and employment opportunities for people across the country.
